name: Alabama
race_tooltip_en: The state of Alabama requires information about your race or ethnicity.  Your application will not be rejected if you fail to provide this information.
party_tooltip_en: You do not have to register with a party if you want to take part in that party's primary election, caucus, or convention.
id_number_tooltip_en: Please provide your Social Security number.  If you do not have a Social Security number, please enter "NONE" and a number will be assigned to you by the state.
sos_address:
Office of the Secretary of State
P.O. Box 5616
Montgomery, AL 36103-5616
sub_18_en: if you will be 18 by the next election (which is usually in November)
sub_18_es: if you will be 18 by the next election (which is usually in November)

name: Alaska
race_tooltip_en: The state of Alaska does not request information about your race or ethnicity.  However, Rock the Vote would appreciate this information in order to measure the effectiveness of our voter registration efforts.  This information will NOT appear on your printed voter registration form.
party_tooltip_en: Alaska has a closed primary election system.  Each recognized political party has a  separate ballot listing only candidates from that political party.  Voters registered as a member of a political party may only vote that party's ballot.   Voters registered as undeclared may choose one ballot from the ballots available.
id_number_tooltip_en: You must provide your Alaska driver's license number or state identification card number.  If you do not have either of those, you must provide the last four digits of your Social Security number.  If you do not have any of these identification numbers, please enter "NONE" and a unique identification number will be assigned to you by the state for voter registration purposes.
sos_address:
Division of Elections
State of Alaska
PO Box 110017
Juneau, AK 99811-0017
sub_18_en: 90 days before your 18th birthday
sub_18_es: 90 days before your 18th birthday

name: Arizona
race_tooltip_en: The state of Arizona does not request information about your race or ethnicity.  However, Rock the Vote would appreciate this information in order to measure the effectiveness of our voter registration efforts.  This information will NOT appear on your printed voter registration form.
party_tooltip_en: If you are registered in a political party which has qualified for ballot recognition, you will be permitted to vote that primary election ballot for that party.  If you are registered as an independent, no party preference or as a member of a party which is not qualified for ballot recognition, you may select and vote one primary election ballot for one of the recognized political parties.
id_number_tooltip_en: You must provide your Arizona driver's license number or non-operating identification license number.  If you do not have a driver's license or non-operating identification number, you must provide the last four digits of your Social Security number.  If you do not have any of these forms of identification, please enter "NONE" and a unique identifying number will be assigned by the state.
sos_address:
Secretary of State/Elections
1700 W. Washington, 7th Floor
Phoenix, AZ 85007-2888
sub_18_en: if you will turn 18 by the next general election (which is usually in November)
sub_18_es: if you will turn 18 by the next general election (which is usually in November)

If you do not have any of these forms of identification, please enter "NONE" and a unique identifying number will be assigned by the state.

Little Rock, AR 72203-8111

name: California
race_tooltip_en: The state of California does not request information about your race or ethnicity.  However, Rock the Vote would appreciate this information in order to measure the effectiveness of our voter registration efforts.  This information will NOT appear on your printed voter registration form.
party_tooltip_en: California law allows voters who decline to state an affiliation with a qualified political party or who affiliate with a nonqualified political party to vote in the primary election of any qualified political party that files a notice with the Secretary of State allowing them to do so.  You can call 1-800-345-VOTE or visit www.ss.ca.gov to learn which political parties are allowing nonaffiliated voters to participate in their primary election.
id_number_tooltip_en: You must provide your California driver's license or California identification card number.  If you do not have either a driver's license or ID card, you must provide the last four digits of your Social Security number.  If you do not include this information, you will be required to provide identification when you vote.
sos_address:
Secretary of State
Elections Division
1500 11th Street 5th floor
Sacramento, CA 95814

name: New Hampshire
not_participating_tooltip_en: New Hampshire law does not allow you to use this form to register to vote.  For information about registering to vote, contact your town or city clerk.  Contact information for town and city clerks are listed at http://www.state.nh.us/sos/clerks.htm.  You can also contact the Secretary of State at 603-271-3242 or visit http://www.state.nh.us/sos/electionsnew.htm.

name: North Carolina
race_tooltip_en: The state of North Carolina requires information about your race or ethnicity.  Your application will not be rejected if you fail to provide this information.
party_tooltip_en: You must register with a party to vote in that party's primary unless that party allows unaffiliated voters to vote in its primary.  If you indicate a political party that is not a qualified party, or indicate no party, you will be listed as "Unaffiliated."
id_number_tooltip_en: You must provide your North Carolina driver's license number or Department of Motor Vehicles identification number.  If you do not have a driver's license or identification number, you must provide the last four digits of your Social Security number.  If you do not have any of these, enter "NONE" and the state will assign you an identification number.
sos_address:
State Board of Elections
P.O. Box 27255
Raleigh, NC 27611-7255
sub_18_en: if you will turn 18 by the next election
sub_18_es: if you will turn 18 by the next election

name: North Dakota
not_participating_tooltip_en: North Dakota does not have voter registration. For more information, contact your Secretary of State at 701-328-3660 or visit http://www.nd.gov/sos.

name: Ohio
race_tooltip_en: The state of Ohio does not request information about your race or ethnicity.  However, Rock the Vote would appreciate this information in order to measure the effectiveness of our voter registration efforts.  This information will NOT appear on your printed voter registration form.
party_tooltip_en: You do not register with a party if you want to take part in that party's primary election.  Party affiliation is established by voting at a primary election.
id_number_tooltip_en: Your Social Security number is requested.  Providing this information is voluntary.   If you do not provide your Social Security number, you must enter your driver's license number or the last four digits of your Social Security number.  If you don't have either number, please enter "NONE" and the state will assign you a number.
sos_address:
Secretary of State of Ohio
Elections Division
180 E. Broad Street - 15th Floor
Columbus, OH 43215
sub_18_en: if you will turn 18 before the next election in November
sub_18_es: if you will turn 18 before the next election in November

name: Oklahoma
race_tooltip_en: The state of Oklahoma does not request information about your race or ethnicity.  However, Rock the Vote would appreciate this information in order to measure the effectiveness of our voter registration efforts.  This information will NOT appear on your printed voter registration form.
party_tooltip_en: You must register with a party if you want to take part in that party's primary election, caucus, or convention.
id_number_tooltip_en: The last four digits of your Social Security number is required.  The state also requests your Oklahoma driver's license number.  If you do not have either number, please enter "NONE" and the state will assign an identification number to you.
sos_address:
Oklahoma State Election Board
Box 528800
Oklahoma City, OK 73152-8800
sub_18_en: if it is 60 days before the next election and you will be 18 years old by that election (usually in November)
sub_18_es: if it is 60 days before the next election and you will be 18 years old by that election (usually in November)

name: Oregon
race_tooltip_en: The state of Oregon does not request information about your race or ethnicity.  However, Rock the Vote would appreciate this information in order to measure the effectiveness of our voter registration efforts.  This information will NOT appear on your printed voter registration form.
party_tooltip_en: You must register with a party if you want to take part in that party's primary election, caucus, or convention.
id_number_tooltip_en: You must provide your Oregon driver's license number.  If you do not have a driver's license number, then you must provide the last four digits of your Social Security number.  If you do not have a driver's license or a Social Security number, please enter "NONE" and the state will assign you an identification number.
sos_address:
Secretary of State
Elections Division
141 State Capitol
Salem, OR 97310-0722
sub_18_en: once you have turned 17 years old
sub_18_es: once you have turned 17 years old

name: Pennsylvania
race_tooltip_en: The state of Pennsylvania requires information about your race or ethnicity.  Your application will not be rejected if you fail to provide this information.
party_tooltip_en: You must register with a party if you want to take part in that party's primary election.
id_number_tooltip_en: You must provide your driver's license number, if you have one.  If you do not have a driver's license number, you must provide the last four digits of your Social Security number.  If you do not have either number, enter "NONE" in the box.
sos_address:
Office of the Secretary of the Commonwealth
210 North Office Bldg.
Harrisburg, PA 17120-0029
sub_18_en: if you will turn 18 by the next election

name: Rhode Island
race_tooltip_en: The state of Rhode Island does not request information about your race or ethnicity.  However, Rock the Vote would appreciate this information in order to measure the effectiveness of our voter registration efforts.  This information will NOT appear on your printed voter registration form.
party_tooltip_en: You must register with a party if you want to take part in that party's primary election.  If you fail to register with a party at the time of registration, you may register with a party on the day of that party's primary and take part in that party's primary election.  If you do not register with a party, you can still vote in general elections and non-partisan primary elections.
id_number_tooltip_en: You must provide your Rhode Island driver's license number if you have been issued a current and valid driver's license.  If you have not been issued a current and valid driver's license, then you must provide the last four digits of your Social Security number.  If you do not have a driver's license or a Social Security number, please enter "NONE" and the state will assign you an identification number.
sos_address:
Rhode Island State Board of Elections
50 Branch Ave.
Providence, RI 02904-2790
sub_18_en: if you will turn 18 by the next election
sub_18_es: if you will turn 18 by the next election

party_tooltip_en: You do not have to register with a party if you want to take part in that party's primary election, caucus, or convention.
id_number_tooltip_en: Your full Social Security number is required.  (If you do not have a Social Security number, enter "NONE" and the state will assign you an identification number.)

party_tooltip_en: You must register with a party if you want to take part in that party's primary election, caucus, or convention.
id_number_tooltip_en: Your driver's license number is requested.  If you do not have a valid driver's license, you must provide the last four digits of your Social Security number.  (If you do not have either a driver's license or a Social Security number, enter "NONE" and the state will assign you an identification number.)

This information will NOT appear on your printed voter registration form.
party_tooltip_en: You do not have to register with a party if you want to take part in that party's primary election, caucus, or convention.
id_number_tooltip_en: You must provide your driver's license number.  If you do not have a driver's license number, you must provide the last four digits of your Social Security number. name: Utah
race_tooltip_en: The state of Utah does not request information about your race or ethnicity.  However, Rock the Vote would appreciate this information in order to measure the effectiveness of our voter registration efforts.  This information will NOT appear on your printed voter registration form.
party_tooltip_en: Utah's election law allows each political party to choose whom it will allow to vote in its primary election.  If you do not affiliate with a party, you may be restricted from voting in the primary.
id_number_tooltip_en: You must provide your state-issued driver's license number or non-operating identification license number.  If you do not have a driver's license or non-operating identification number, you must provide the last four digits of your Social Security number.  If you do not have any of these forms of identification, please enter "NONE" and a unique identifying number will be assigned by the state.
sos_address:
Office of the Lieutenant Governor
P.O. Box 142325
Salt Lake City, UT 84114

This information will NOT appear on your printed voter registration form.
party_tooltip_en: Vermont does not require party registration to participate in any election.
id_number_tooltip_en: You must provide your driver's license number.  If you do not have a driver's license number, you must provide the last four digits of your Social Security number.  If you do not have either number, enter "NONE" and a unique identifying number will be assigned to you by the state.
sos_address:

Director of Elections
26 Terrace Street
Montpelier, VT 05609-1101

id_number_tooltip_en: You must provide your driver's license number.  If you do not have a driver's license number, then you must provide the last four digits of your Social Security number. This information will NOT appear on your printed voter registration form.
party_tooltip_en: You are not required to designate your party affiliation to register to vote in Wisconsin.
id_number_tooltip_en: Please provide your driver's license number.  If you do not have a current and valid driver's license, please enter the last four digits of your Social Security number or your full Department of Transportation-issued identification card number. name: Wyoming
not_participating_tooltip_en: Wyoming law does not allow you to use this form to register to vote.  To learn more about registering to vote in Wyoming, please contact the county clerk where you live.  Contact information can be found at http://soswy.state.wy.us/election/clerks.htm or by calling 307-777-3573.
